channel.title: PLEASE!My run.bat/server files don't work! neither does my command propmt! WTF?
channel.description:
hey people when ever i go to like run a server or a client the command prompt thing thats supposed to come up comes up for like a second and disappears. Also when ever i go into command prompt and type a command such as [code]ipconfig[/code] it always says its not a recognized command. can someone help? would this have to do with me setting my system classpath to what my personal classpath should be? someone help! :(
and yes this does have to do with my post about buying a laptop with Vista if you were wondering because i have been trying to figure this out for the longest time!

item.title: PLEASE!My run.bat/server files don't work! neither does my command propmt! WTF?
item.dc:creator: @ruudiluca ruudiluca
item.description:
@ruudiluca wrote:

[quote=“bobthecat, post:1, topic:199571”]hey people when ever i go to like run a server or a client the command prompt thing thats supposed to come up comes up for like a second and disappears. Also when ever i go into command prompt and type a command such as ipconfig it always says its not a recognized command. can someone help? would this have to do with me setting my system classpath to what my personal classpath should be? someone help!

Gah! Same for me! Heeeelp! It turns on! The theme tune turns on! Then it disappears!
and yes this does have to do with my post about buying a laptop with Vista if you were wondering because i have been trying to figure this out for the longest time![/quote]
